dataTable.name: machinemanage
dataTable.creat: create database if not exists `machinemanage` DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8 ;

tables.creat: CREATE  TABLE if not exists `machinetype` (`idmachinetype` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT ,`typename` VARCHAR(45) NULL ,PRIMARY KEY (`idmachinetype`) ,UNIQUE INDEX `typename_UNIQUE` (`typename` ASC) );
